open.title: Frogfoot Degraded service | Benoni
open.description: We are still investigating reports of limited to no connectivity affecting clients on the Afrihost and Frogfoot network in Benoni. We are working on identifying a solution to this issue as quickly as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience that this may be causing.

updates.content: We are still actively working on the issue with Frogfoot. We apologise for the issues experienced.

open.title: Vuma Reach outage | Glencoe, Ladysmith and Dundee
open.description: Vuma Reach has informed us of a network outage affecting Glencoe, Ladysmith and Dundee, affected clients will experience {no connectivity. Vuma Reach engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

closed.title: FrogFoot outage | Eastern and Western Cape
closed.description: FrogFoot has informed us of a network outage affecting Eastern and Western Cape, affected clients will experience intermittent connection drops and slow speeds. FrogFoot engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.

updates.content: 09/02/2023 | An emergency change has been scheduled for 23:00 to 05:00 to attend to the ongoing intermittent connection being experienced. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.
